record.title: MOMENT OF SILENCE IN MEMORY OF THE LATE HONORABLE JACK METCALF

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I rise to inform my colleagues that last Thursday, one of our former colleagues, Jack Metcalf, who represented the Second District in Washington State, passed away.
So, Madam Speaker, I would ask if we could have a moment of silence in his remembrance.

record.chair: Members will rise and the House will observe a moment of silence.
